parameters.name: workflowBuildVersionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the workflow resource that you want to get.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the workflow resource.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow resource.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The workflow resource version. Workflow resources are immutable. To make a change, you can clone a workflow or create a new version.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the workflow.

nested_items.name: changeDescription
nested_items.description: Describes what change has been made in this version of the workflow, or what makes this version different from other versions of the workflow.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: Specifies the image creation stage that the workflow applies to. Image Builder currently supports build and test workflows.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The current state of the workflow.

nested_items.name: reason
nested_items.description: Describes how or why the workflow changed state.

nested_items.name: owner
nested_items.description: The owner of the workflow resource.

nested_items.name: data
nested_items.description: Contains the YAML document content for the workflow.

nested_items.name: kmsKeyId
nested_items.description: The KMS key identifier used to encrypt the workflow resource.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The timestamp when Image Builder created the workflow resource.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: An array of input parameters that that the image workflow uses to control actions or configure settings.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of this input parameter.

nested_items.name: type
nested_items.description: The type of input this parameter provides. The currently supported value is 'string'.

nested_items.name: defaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of this parameter if no input is provided.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: Describes this parameter.
